column2: Ensure Talents sign up on account
Ensure the talent account remians active
Ensure talents create and publish on an exclusive basis
Ensure all clips uploaded on platform adhere to the necessary terms and conditions for an upload.
Ensure Influencers uphold the commitment to create and publish to the platform (5) original clips per term month
Ensure clips are forwarded from the plaform to the social network platform
Ensure talents in this category upload (10) original clips per term month
Ensure clips are forwarded from he platform (15) original clips to social network platform
avoid unauthorized changes on original clips which have already been accepted
Avoid removing/deleting an orginal clip that has been published on the platform or social media accounts without a prior wirtten approval
Talents failure to meet minimum original clips without a prior written approval
FOR INFLUENCERS: Talents failure to meet the minimum 10000VV; 387 without promotion
7 days Guaranteed Views after posting original clips
Avoid the publication of any talent content that violates applicable law, the terms and policies of the platform or contents that adversely impact the reputation or goodwill of the platform.
